31.43: Then Laban replied to Jacob, 'The daughters are my daughters, and the children are my children, and the flocks are my flocks, and all that you see is mine. But what can I do this day to these my daughters or to their children whom they have borne?
31.48: Laban said, 'This heap is a witness between you and me this day.' Therefore it was named Galeed,
